channel.title: Micro-controllers on Old Habits AI Hard
channel.description: Recent content in Micro-controllers on Old Habits AI Hard

item.title: Undergrad Projects
item.description: Education I studied at the Manipal Institute of Technology, Manipal, India. I graduated with a Bachelor of Technology in Electronics and Communication Engineering in 2017. When I joined I was enrolled in the Chemical Engineering program. I switched to Electronics and Communication Engineering in my second year. I graduated with a CGPA of 8.6/10. Electives and Projects Electives Shell Scripting in Linux Cyptography MEMS (micro electro mechanical systems) Robotics. Projects Implemented AES (Advanced Encryption Standard) from scratch in VHDL Made a digit recognizer using the MSP420 micro-controller Built a chainsaw robot for TechTatva Built a heat exchanger
